explanation: [0-0] A man is sitting in front of a drum set, wearing a red sweater and headphones. In the upper right corner is a picture of Snoopy wearing a Santa hat, standing on a stool in the kitchen, trying to reach a can of ice cream on the counter. The drum set in front of the man is covered with a purple cloth, a white ball is placed on the cloth, and there is a glockenspiel beside it. The background is black.

[0-10] Then, the man uses a few pieces of paper to make the sound of Snoopy scooping ice cream, and then slides the paper over the purple cloth to make the sound of the ice cream box moving. The man smiles and continues to fan the paper in his hand, making the action of Snoopy pouring chocolate sauce, and then slides his right hand over the paper to make the sound of Snoopy squeezing whipped cream.
